overview:
Motivated marketer who enjoys fast-paced, high tech environments, which foster growth and innovation

• Seasoned product marketing, mobile apps, e-commerce and social media management executive • Experienced in product marketing across PR, AR, positioning, pricing, and driving go-to-market strategy • Delivers social media strategy aligned to enterprise objectives, delivering high-value follower-ship • Co-Founder of KurbKarma, a “Social Network for Parking” - Battlefield Finalist at TechCrunch Disrupt 2012

Goals • Advise emerging businesses and startups on their customer acquisition strategy • Help companies optimize their Web channels for increased revenue. • Extend product marketing experience and skills to new products or companies

Specialties Web, Mobile & Cloud Computing Marketing • Web as a Channel • Social Media Management • Go to Market Planning • Product Marketing • Messaging and Positioning • Web Marketing Programs • Marketing Plan Management & Execution • Brand Management and Naming

Certified Sommelier | Wine Enthusiast • Wine List Consultation • Customized Wine Tasting & Education Events • Marketing Support and Representation for wineries

milestones.description: Neha was interviewed by ABC7 as a co-founder of KurbKarma
milestones.source_description: ABC7 News - New apps make it easier to drive, park in SF
KurbKarma Launched at TechCrunch Disrupt NYC
